events.message: The insured reported a vehicle collision that occurred on the morning of April 30, resulting in significant front-end damage to the car.
The claim was reviewed and categorised under Auto Accident due to the nature of the car collision and damages involved.
An agent has been assigned to the claim to facilitate communication and guide the customer through the claim process.
The company officially acknowledged receipt of the claim and assured the customer that the investigation would begin promptly.
Requested submission of police reports, photos of the damaged vehicle, and a vehicle repair estimate to proceed with the claim investigation.
The customer submitted all requested documents, including the police report and detailed repair estimate from the authorized garage.
Investigation to verify claim details and evaluate damages was initiated following receipt of all necessary paperwork.
The investigation concluded with confirmation of the accident circumstances matching the submitted documentation.
A settlement amount covering the full estimated repair costs was proposed to the customer for approval.
The insured communicated acceptance of the proposed settlement and expressed gratitude for the quick resolution.
Claim was officially approved based on investigation results and the insured’s acceptance of the settlement offer.
Payment covering the agreed settlement amount was issued to the insured’s designated bank account.
The claim file has been closed after successful payment issuance and client confirmation of receipt.
